body_html:
@bowang Those numbers should be in the RunMetadata - but they will be shown as kernel times on a device with name "/gpu:0/stream...". If you use the timings from the "/gpu:0" device you will just see the time taken to enqueue the CUDA kernels (i.e. the time spent in MatMulOp::Compute())

This is likely to be a problem with tfprof, not the tracing. I expect that the chrome timeline will show the correct behavior. (if it doesn't then this is a TF bug!)

It would help to have a copy of the RunMetadata proto (or just the StepStats).
